sneeze.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if you sneeze, air suddenly comes from your nose, making a noise, for example when you have a cold
sneeze.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The dust was making him sneeze.
sneeze.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the act or sound of sneezing
sneeze.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: There was a loud sneeze from someone in the back of the audience.
